message.entry: Check output dimensions of MATLAB Function blocks

Check the model for MATLAB Function blocks that have the 'Interpret output column vectors as one-dimensional data' property enabled. If this property is enabled, the block converts output column vectors of size N-by-1 to one-dimensional signals with a signal size equal to N. Before R2021b, MATLAB Function blocks always had this property enabled.
Click the Fix it button to disable the 'Interpret output column vectors as one-dimensional data' property in the listed MATLAB Function blocks that have multidimensional outputs.
Disabled the 'Interpret output column vectors as one-dimensional data' property in the listed MATLAB Function blocks that have multidimensional outputs.
These MATLAB Function blocks produce one-dimensional outputs and have the 'Interpret output column vectors as one-dimensional data' property enabled:
These MATLAB Function blocks have the 'Interpret output column vectors as one-dimensional data' property enabled:

Disable the 'Interpret output column vectors as one-dimensional data' property of the listed MATLAB Function blocks. You can also modify the same using 'VectorOutputs1D' property in 'MATLABFunctionConfiguration'.

Disable the 'Interpret output column vectors as one-dimensional data' property of the listed MATLAB Function blocks. If this property is enabled, the block converts output column vectors of size N-by-1 to one-dimensional signals with a signal size equal to N. This changes the size propagation behavior of these blocks. As a result, clicking the Fix it button does not update the property of these blocks.
The model does not contain any MATLAB Function blocks with the 'Interpret output column vectors as one-dimensional data' property enabled.
